extendedInfo.description: Limited time holiday sale!  This mini ASL dictionary with 1,000+ signs is a great way to kick start your Sign Language experience.  Works with tablets, too!Learn with such simplicity with three ASL professors (Gilda Toby Ganezer, Avery Posner and April Starks). Please be PATIENT as this app is whopping BIG with over 600 MB in size, just download once and it plays offline and anywhere!Enjoy and support our programs with our famous SIGN LANGUAGE PRO app for Android.For more free ASL videos and tutorials, join our Facebook fan page at http://www.bit.ly/eapfb

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: The app itself is great, a good sized dictionary and clear videos.  But the fact that an app of this size can\'t be moved to the SD card on an unrooted device makes it almost unusable. The developer needs to make it movable. I\'ll probably end up  deleting it to get my memory back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great selection, but more than half of the videos don\'t work... needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Can\'t watch any of the videos on LG Optimus T.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.comment: None of the videos play, Samsung galaxy S blaze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I payed money for the videos not to work
reviews.author: A Google User
